title: Dodgers' Ohtani becomes 4-time unanimous MVP
content: Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani won his fourth MVP in five seasons, all of them in unanimous fashion, beating out the Phillies' Kyle Schwarber and the Mets' Juan Soto for the 2025 NL award.

title: MLS switching schedule to align with world soccer
content: The MLS board of governors voted Thursday to align with the international soccer calendar by shifting the regular season to a summer-to-spring campaign, beginning in 2027.

title: John Force, 76, retires after NHRA-best 157 wins
content: John Force, a 16-time Funny Car champion and the face of NHRA drag racing for nearly four decades, has formally retired.

title: 14 charged in betting ring involving athletes
content: Fourteen people were charged for their roles in a multimillion-dollar illegal sports betting ring that involved college athletes and had links to organized crime, New Jersey authorities announced Thursday.

title: Report: Ex-coach of 'Last Chance U' school shot
content: A senior athletics staff member at Laney College in Oakland was shot on campus and taken to a hospital Thursday.

title: Warriors' Curry, Under Armour ending partnership
content: Stephen Curry and Under Armour are ending their long-standing partnership, and sources told ESPN that Curry is expected to have freedom to wear other brands over the next year and pursue new partnership deals.

content: Kai Trump shot a 13-over 83 on Thursday in her LPGA Tour debut in The Annika, leaving President Donald Trump's granddaughter last in the 108-player field.

title: NDA gains advantage; BJP and JD(U) maintain edge over RJD in early trends ‚Äî highlights
content: Bihar's electoral fate is being decided today as vote counting commenced for all 243 assembly seats. Simultaneously, results for eight assembly bypolls across six states and Jammu and Kashmir are also being declared. This marks the first Bihar assembly election in twenty years following a thorough revision of voter lists, with final outcomes anticipated by evening.

title: 6 Dec,6 bombs, 6 cities: JeM module planned serial blasts; wanted to ‚Äòavenge‚Äô Babri demolition
content: A Pakistan-backed Jaish-e-Mohammed "white-collar" terrorist network of medics was busted across Haryana, UP, and J&K. They plotted coordinated bombings in six cities on December 6, the anniversary of the Babri Masjid demolition, to "avenge" the 1992 event. Investigators are probing their financial chain and command structure, with potential links to a recent car blast in New Delhi.

title: Delhi car blast: Agencies blow up Red Fort bomber Dr Umar Nabi's Pulwama house
content: Security agencies demolished the Pulwama house of Dr. Umar Nabi, who orchestrated a car bombing near Delhi's Red Fort on November 10, killing 13.  Investigators revealed Nabi was part of a Jaish-e-Mohammed and Ansar Ghazwat-ul-Hind module, guided by a foreign handler named Ukasa, with plot origins in Turkey.

title: Apple‚ÄìTesla twist: After 10+ years of refusing, Elon Musk may have said ‚Äòyes‚Äô to Apple
content: Tesla is reportedly developing support for Apple's CarPlay, a significant reversal for CEO Elon Musk who has long resisted the feature. This move comes as the company faces softening demand, with some buyers citing the absence of CarPlay as a deterrent. The integration will occur within a windowed environment, not fully replacing Tesla's native interface.

title: Gold price prediction: What's the outlook for today? Here's what investors should do
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are exhibiting a bearish bias, with a short-term consolidation expected. Technical indicators suggest fading upside momentum, with resistance at ‚Çπ1,27,200 and support at ‚Çπ1,26,100.

title: GM to suppliers: Find alternatives to China; America‚Äôs largest carmaker sets deadline
content: General Motors is directing thousands of suppliers to remove China-sourced parts and raw materials from their supply chains, aiming for complete divestment by 2027. This move, intensified by deepening U.S.-China trade hostilities and President Trump's policies, seeks to enhance supply chain resiliency. Carmakers are accelerating efforts to unwind decades-old sourcing ties due to ongoing geopolitical and economic wrangling.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens below 25,800; BSE Sensex down almost 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Friday on weak global cues. While Nifty50 was below 25,800, BSE Sensex was down almost 300 points.

title: Bihar election results: Key fights to watch out for; big verdict today
content: Bihar's high-stakes elections conclude with results due Friday. Exit polls hint at an NDA return, with all eyes on the counting. The article highlights key constituencies like Raghopur, Madhepura, and Alinagar, featuring prominent political figures and intriguing contests.  Internal INDIA bloc 'friendly fights' between Congress and RJD/CPI(ML) could impact the outcome.

title: Mahua election result 2025: Tej Pratap trailing; Sanjay Singh of LJP (RV) takes lead
content: Vote counting begins today in Mahua, where Tej Pratap Yadav is making a high-stakes bid to reclaim the seat he debuted in. He's contesting as an independent against RJD's incumbent Mukesh Kumar Raushan and LJP's Sanjay Singh, aiming to disrupt the existing political landscape.

title: Vibe coding: Meta‚Äôs AI chief's advice for teens; 'spend time on this skill'
content: Meta's AI chief, Alexandr Wang, urges teenagers to master AI tools, likening the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding' ‚Äì hands-on experimentation with AI ‚Äì to gain a significant future economic advantage, much like early programmers did with computers.

title: Anta bypoll 2025 result: BJP‚Äôs Morpal Suman leads in early trends
content: The Anta Assembly by-election in Rajasthan sees a direct contest between Congress candidate Pramod Jain Bhaya and BJP's Morpal Suman, with Congress rebel Naresh Meena also in the fray. The bypoll, held after the disqualification of a BJP MLA, recorded a high voter turnout of 80.21%.

title: Russia launches missiles, drones on Ukraine; every district in Kyiv under 'massive' attack
content: Kyiv experienced a 'massive' attack early Friday morning, with air defense forces actively engaged. Explosions were reported across the city, leading to injuries and fires in residential buildings. This escalation follows recent intensified attacks by Moscow on the Ukrainian capital.

title: 1st Test: Pant, Jurel in playing XI - who is missing out?
content: South Africa have won the toss and elected to bat first in the opening Test against India. The Proteas are aiming to break their 25-year winless streak in India. Both teams have announced their playing XIs. India's captain Shubman Gill expressed confidence in the pitch. South Africa's captain Temba Bavuma highlighted the challenge of playing in India.

title: Bengaluru techie overtakes, rams car into scooter in ‚Äòdeliberate attack' on family of 3
content: A Bengaluru techie, Sukruth Gowda, has been arrested for attempted murder following a road rage incident. He allegedly rammed his car into a couple and their son's scooter after a dispute over space at a signal. The victims were hospitalized, with the father requiring further treatment. Police identified the accused through CCTV footage and his subsequent confession.

title: Mokama election results: Anant Singh leads in early trends against RJD's Veena Devi
content: Mokama is set for a tight three-way race between RJD, BJP, and Jan Suraaj candidates.  Bihar's election results are due today, with polls suggesting an NDA victory.  The Mokama constituency, a General category seat in Patna district, saw an RJD win in 2020.  Voter turnout in Bankipur increased significantly.

title: Olympic legend Surya Bonaly loses all medals to Las Vegas thieves
content: Olympic figure skater Surya Bonaly is devastated after thieves stole all her career medals while she was in Minnesota caring for her mother, who is also battling cancer. The burglary at her Las Vegas home revealed broken windows and destroyed security cameras, with surveillance footage indicating multiple individuals were involved over several days.

title: NHL Trade Rumors: Doug Armstrong faces calls on Schenn, Kyrou, Thompson
content: Trade rumors swirl around the St. Louis Blues as GM Doug Armstrong signals openness to deals. Players like Schenn and Kyrou are subjects of speculation. Meanwhile, Buffalo Sabres are firm on keeping star player Tage Thompson. The Blues are expected to make adjustments, but a complete overhaul is unlikely. Thompson remains a core part of Buffalo's future plans.

title: 'She's keeping it confidential': Taylor Swift planning surprise for Travis Kelce
content: Taylor Swift's upcoming documentary, 'The End of an Era,' offers a glimpse into her Eras Tour and her romance with Travis Kelce.  Rumors suggest Swift is also penning a film inspired by their relationship, a modern 'Romeo & Juliet.'  While details remain secret, fans anticipate insights into Swift's creative process and personal life.

title: Islamabad blast: Sri Lanka tour in turmoil - A complete timeline of the crisis
content: Pakistan Cricket Board chairman Mohsin Naqvi personally reviewed security in Rawalpindi after a blast in Islamabad unsettled the visiting Sri Lankan team.  Despite initial concerns and some players wanting to return home, the tour continued after assurances from Pakistan's military chief and PCB, showcasing a stand for peace.

title: FIFA WC 2026: Why Ronaldo could face a ban; miss Portugal's opener
content: Cristiano Ronaldo received his first-ever international red card for elbowing an opponent, potentially jeopardising his participation in the 2026 World Cup opener.  While Portugal's coach defended the action as harsh, FIFA regulations suggest a ban of at least two matches for serious foul play.  A victory against Armenia will secure Portugal's World Cup spot.

title: Fiery Pune crash: 8 dead, 13 injured as car sandwiched between 2 trucks explodes
content: A trailer truck lost control and crashed into 13 vehicles on the Pune-Bengaluru highway, resulting in eight deaths and 13 injuries. The impact caused a car to be sandwiched between two trucks, leading to a massive fire and charring victims. The deceased include five car occupants and the truck driver and cleaner.

title: 75+ Happy Children's Day messages, greetings, wishes and quotes for 2025
content: India celebrates Children's Day on November 14, honoring the birth anniversary of Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru. This day emphasizes nurturing children's spirit, innocence, and potential, encouraging them to become responsible citizens. Schools organize activities to celebrate childhood, and the article offers over 75 messages, greetings, and quotes to share.

content: A video of the incident, which has since gone viral on social media, shows Dhoni writing his autograph on the petrol tank of a red bike. Before walking away, he looked at the vehicle and told the fan, ‚ÄúChala ke report dena (Do share its review).‚Äù

Recent polls suggest an NDA victory in Bihar, with Katihar historically witnessing close contests between BJP and RJD. title: Drake Maye‚Äôs wife Ann goes viral after admitting her risky pre-game outfit mishap
content: Quarterback Drake Maye leads the red-hot 8-2 New England Patriots into a Thursday night matchup with the Jets, while his wife Ann draws attention after a playful TikTok moment about her skirt, saying, ‚ÄúThis skirt is SO short‚Ä¶ so pray for me there.‚Äù With seven straight wins and rising fan buzz, the Mayes continue to captivate New England on and off the field.

title: Kargahar election results: Congress' Santosh Kumar takes on JDU's Bashisth Singh
content: Vote counting begins today for the Kargahar assembly constituency, a seat won by Congress in 2020 by a narrow margin of 4,083 votes. Historically held by JD(U), the constituency's outcome is crucial, with analysts anticipating a triangular contest this year. The results will signal whether Congress can maintain its hold or if JD(U) and allies can regain the seat.

title: Danapur election result: BJP's Ram Kripal Yadav and RJD's Rit Lal Roy in fray
content: Danapur awaits vote counting for a direct contest between BJP's Ram Kripal Yadav and RJD's Rit Lal Roy. The constituency, with a mixed urban-rural base, has seen shifting political preferences over decades. Recent polls suggest an NDA lead in the broader election.

title: Is Donovan Mitchell playing tonight vs Raptors? Latest update on Cavs star‚Äôs status
content: Donovan Mitchell returns for the Cleveland Cavaliers tonight against the Toronto Raptors, boosting team confidence amidst ongoing injuries to key players like Darius Garland and Lonzo Ball.  Donovan Mitchell's availability is crucial for Cleveland Cavaliers's competitive edge.  The Raptors face their own injury concerns, making this a highly anticipated matchup.

title: Bihar Polls: Schools to remain shut today as Lalu aide warns of ‚ÄòNepal-like‚Äô stir
content: Bihar authorities closed schools and heightened security ahead of vote counting, prompted by an RJD leader's warning of "Nepal-like protests" if irregularities occurred. The legislator alleged past counting delays and claimed his party's majority, asserting voters sought Tejashwi Yadav as CM. Ruling party leaders countered, emphasizing the rule of law and Election Commission oversight.

title: Chaos at Shreya Ghoshal's Cuttack concert: One injured as crowd surges toward stage
content: A brief surge of enthusiastic fans at Shreya Ghoshal's Cuttack concert caused a momentary halt and minor injury to one attendee. Police quickly restored order amidst a massive crowd at the Bali Jatra festival. Officials confirmed the situation was managed effectively, with no major unrest reported, despite a large turnout.

content: Fewer international students are applying to US colleges this year, an early indication that the White House push to curtail foreign enrolment since President Donald Trump took office in January may be having an impact.

content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday paid tributes to Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru, India's first Prime Minister, on the occasion of his 125th birth anniversary, celebrated as Children's Day.

title: Russia Launches Massive Strike On Ukraine's Kyiv, Injuring 11
content: Russian forces launched a massive drone and missile attack on Kyiv early on Friday, striking residential buildings and triggering explosions and fires in districts throughout the capital, officials said.

title: US To Remove Tariffs On Foods, Other Imports From 4 Latin American Nations
content: The United States said on Thursday it will remove tariffs on some foods and other imports from Argentina, Ecuador, Guatemala and El Salvador under framework agreements that will give US firms greater access to those markets.

title: Pakistan Minister Admits Islamabad Failed To Benefit From China's Economic Corridor
content: A Pakistani minister has admitted that Islamabad failed to benefit from the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC) before political controversies under the previous Imran Khan government forced Chinese investors to flee.

title: Children‚Äôs Day: Schools must speak the child‚Äôs language and not the more remote ‚Äòstandard‚Äô language
content: In multilingual and multi-dialectal Hyderabad‚ÄìKarnataka region, the gap between classroom language and home speech continues to hold children back

title: Bihar Assembly election 2025 results LIVE: NDA pulls ahead in early trends, Mahagathbandhan distant second
content: Early trends show the BJP leading among NDA parties; meanwhile, the much-anticipated Jan Suraaj is yet to open in the lead.

title: Down the corridors in the engines of digital India
content: Data centres of big tech firms are booming across the country, fuelled by a global AI spending craze.¬†The Hindu¬†finds that while Mumbai and Chennai are the current hubs, other places are also seeing the opening of high-rise buildings, their spaces barely inhabited by people. Each floor houses machines whirring with information in an industry where tech intersects with real estate

title: Motorists complain of poor lighting on OMR; TNRDC to install lights
content: A motorist says it is difficult to navigate through the arterial road¬†without the lights from the shops on either side, and the damaged service lanes are also poorly lit

title: Ajit Pawar offered to resign over Pune land deal, alleged Shiv Sena (UBT) leader
content: Ambadas Danve, also criticised Revenue Minister Chandrashekhar Bawankule, saying the minister and his state revenue department had a difference of opinion concerning the stamp duty on the deal

title: Punjab police claims to have busted Pakistan-based ISI backed grenade attack module
content: An FIR was registered on October 27, 2025, under sections 3, 4, and 5 of the Explosives Act and Section 113 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) at police station Jodhewal.

title: U.P. focused on empowerment, welfare of tribal communities, says CM Yogi
content: The CM reiterated the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) government‚Äôs commitment of restoring pride of tribal community and protecting their heritage

title: Police reconstruct Red Fort blast suspect‚Äôs last hours using footage from 50 cameras
content: Police investigating the blast said the suspects had pooled more than ‚Çπ26 lakh in cash, which was handed over to Nabi for safekeeping and operational use.

title: Two more held for Delhi blast; Al-Falah University faces audit
content: One more victim dies; police collect forensic evidence from Jain temple and nearby market; J&K Police issue Red Notice against another doctor; agencies trace shops that sold ammonium nitrate

title: BJD alleges large scale rigging in Nuapada bypoll, wonders at 91% polling in 41 booths
content: The regional party demands the CCTV footages of booths recording above 90% polling be made available to public

title: Retired Army General‚Äôs car rammed: 24 hours later Punjab police yet to disclose its identity
content: DGP Yadav said the Punjab police duty is not just to protect threatened persons but also to uphold public dignity, safety, and confidence on the roads

title: The perils of translation
content: Failures to translate words without considering the cultural context, historical reverence, and linguistic nuances can prove disastrous

title: 23 survivors of blast cling to life at Lok Nayak Hospital; families hold on to hope
content: Most of the patients in stable condition, but three remain in ICU, say hospital authorities; several of them sustained burn injuries, lost limbs: doctors; heavy security in place at emergency ward with access tightly controlled; anxious relatives camping at hospital awaiting recovery of their loved ones

title: Kolkata film festival celebrates the voices of resilience with 3 screenings of Palestine 36
content: As film lovers poured in in huge numbers, the three screenings of the historical Palestinian drama received huge applause

title: Manmohan remained focused on economic growth as PM despite strong contrary views: Montek
content: Dr. Singh‚Äôs tenure as the finance minister was the high point of his career, as it was transformative for the nation

title: The Tamil Nadu model of sub-State climate action
content: In the State‚Äôs ‚Äòbottom-up‚Äô approach, district-level decarbonisation plans and a real-time tracker are helping shape climate actions at the local and sub-local levels

content: Leads + Wins :  0 / 243 A new interactive way to explore constituencies Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‚Äòprime‚Äô political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India‚Äôs neighbourhood. Read More

title: 'Totally misconceived': SC junks Tamil Nadu objection to DPR for Mekedatu project
content: supreme court rejects Tamil Nadu's strident opposition to Karnataka's proposed multi-purpose Mekedatu project . govt's objection to preparation of detailed project report is "totally misconceived and premature" a bench of CWMA and the central water commission says the application is "strategy of contempt of court"

title: Centre releases draft Seeds Bill; industry welcomes; farm outfits cautious
content: Bill defines farmers, seed traders and importers; provides for setting up seed committees at States and Centre

title: Barrier-less tolling systems: government to revisit bank-centric bidding model
content: Primacy is being given to banks, which act as the primary bidder and the system integrator, as they are part of a regulator sector, but the model is not scalable, says official

title: Reports that claim SC has approved Mekedatu project are not true: Duraimurugan
content: The Minister for Water Resources says the Tamil Nadu government will not compromise on the rights of Cauvery delta farmers, and will resist Karnataka‚Äôs attempts to build the reservoir

title: Air India's Toronto-Delhi flight gets bomb threat; flight lands safely in national capital
content: The message was received at around 11:30 a.m. when the flight, operated with a Boeing 777 aircraft, was mid-air and was little over four hours away from Delhi

title: How is SEC ensuring fair elections? | Explained
content: How will Maharashtra‚Äôs State Election Commission tackle duplicate and missing entries? Who can raise objections and how will they be resolved? Will the Opposition‚Äôs concerns on the electoral rolls be addressed? What steps ensure voters don‚Äôt cast multiple ballots?

title: Five held for fabricating false case against police officer in Guntur
content: Police are on the hunt for BRK News Channel reporter Kanneganti Arun Babu who masterminded the plan to implicate Circle Inspector Matangi Srinivasa Rao after the latter refused to pay him money, says SP

title: Supreme Court wants government to promote EVs amid high air pollution
content: The top court suggested that the government could start pilot projects in metros to promote the use of EVs; the Centre said a complete shift to EVs is a major policy decision

title: Supreme Court reserves verdict on plea seeking compensation for deaths ‚Äòlinked‚Äô to COVID-19 vaccines
content: Petitioners allege that their daughters died of brain clots after vaccination; counsel says information about after-effects was suppressed

title: Unions slam labour policy for ignoring ‚Äòground realities‚Äô
content: In a joint response, Central Trade Unions said the new draft labour policy appeared to be less a roadmap for worker empowerment, and more an ideological project to redefine labour, not as a right but as a ‚Äòsacred duty‚Äô; Labour Minister assured draft could be changed after consultations

title: Calcutta High Court disqualifies politician Mukul Roy from West Bengal Legislative Assembly under anti-defection law
content: Roy joined the Trinamool Congress in June 2021 after being elected as an MLA from the Krishnanagar Uttar constituency on a BJP ticket.

title: Centre suspends over 4,000 fertiliser distributor licences on hoarding charges
content: The Union Department of Fertilisers said it conducted a comprehensive drive with the Union Agriculture Ministry to protect farmer interests and secure the national fertiliser supply chain

title: Rise in diabetic foot condition: Doctors now employ AI for early detection

title: Supreme Court protects 314 sq. km of pristine sal forest in Jharkhand‚Äôs Saranda
content: Home to tribal communities and endangered wildlife, Saranda forest division also accounts for 26% of India‚Äôs iron ore reserves; State initially sought smaller sanctuary, but later clarified there are no mines in the extended area

title: Commuters urge BMTC to adopt NCMC as Bengaluru lags in unified mobility
content: The Bangalore Metro Rail Corporation Ltd. and RBL Bank began issuing NCMC on March 25, 2023, coinciding with the inauguration of the Whitefield‚ÄìKrishnarajapura metro line

title: Yankees' Judge edges Raleigh, wins third AL MVP
content: the American League Most Valuable Player Award was voted by the Baseball Writers' Association of America . judge was the 13th player to win three or more MVPs . he joins Yogi Berra, Joe DiMaggio and Mickey Mantle as the only Yankees to achieve the feat .

title: Women's Power Rankings: The 16 best teams so far
content: the first edition of ESPN's women's college basketball Power Rankings for 2025-26 . the top four teams in our initial rankings are the programs that went to the Final Four last season . of that group, UCLA has the most impressive victory so far: 73-59 over fellow top-10 team Oklahoma on Monday .

title: Men's Power Rankings: Biggest early-season risers
content: 81 points between the two proving that their lack of perimeter shooting isn't much of a factor . the Crimson Tide had elite guards, but it wasn't clear whether they had the frontcourt balance to make another deep run in March .

title: FIFA's worst-ranked team can still qualify for the World Cup
content: 'ESPN FC TV' debates where there's space in Thomas Tuchel's 2026 squad . he publicly declared that Harry Kane , Jude Bellingham and Phil Foden couldn't all play effectively in the same lineup . the final 25 minutes of this game were by some distance the most interesting .

title: Week 12 preview: A wide-open ACC title race, key matchups and more
content: a slew of teams are teetering on a thin line between being in or out . this week features four ranked matchups that could shift the playoff picture dramatically . no. 9 Notre Dame's margin for error is zero as it faces a 7-2 Pittsburgh team .
